name: Tarot (Games by Dan)
description:
I'm researching procedural narrative generation as part of my studies. This program is an experiment in that field.

The premise is that you're being shown the story of one of countless past lives you have lived. 5 cards represent the 5 parts to a story.

If you'd like to participate in my study, please fill out this questionnaire after completing a reading - https://form.jotform.com/220813803607047

All data collected will be handled with consideration and kept anonymous. By participating in this test you consent to the information provided to be used as part of the study.

Windows OS required!
